category: Product > materials, treatments and surfaces (including paneling)
description_html: Breathe new life into your space with TRANSFORM by Caesarstone, the first 13MM quartz overlay surface solution from Caesarstone that allows homeowners to upgrade kitchens, bathrooms and other home surfaces with no demolition and limited disruption to their busy life. Homeowners can add elegance to their homes by resurfacing their countertops with the premium look and long lasting quality of Caesarstone in a matter of hours. Eat breakfast on your old surface and dinner on the new! TRANSFORM is simply applied over existing countertops, giving a luxurious update without the time, tear-out and cost of a full remodel. TRANSFORM delivers the same quality, durability and beauty that homeowners expect from Caesarstone. As with all Caesarstone surfaces, TRANSFORM is low maintenance, scratch, stain, heat and crack resistant and is covered by a lifetime warranty. TRANSFORM overlays most surfaces, including tile, laminate, stainless steel, granite, concrete, and butcher-block, and is now available in select colors.
